text: minissunta godak welawata ee pudgalaya janapriya wuye kumak arabhayada yanna wadagath natha.

widhayaka janadhipathi dhuraya ahosikirime podu aramunak kara owun polambauwanu labanneth rajapaksha aanduwe kenehilikam ha adamthettamwalin pidawindiman siti sarath ponsekata podu apekshakathawaya labenneth an karunak nisa nowa wiruddha pakshayange me nohakiyawa nisamaya. 2010 janadhipathiwaranaya thula pennumkarana pahadili sathyaya nam wiruddha pakshawalata thani pakshayak lesa rajapaksha rejimaya parajayakirimata athi nohakiyawa misa widhayaka janadhipathi ka්ramaya ahosikirimata athi parama awanka abhilashaya nowe.
